entries.title: Amsterdam hotel could take legal action over appearance in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
entries.description: The five-star Conservatorium Hotel doesn't appreciate being the scene of countless virtual gunfights.

entries.title: This solo-developed, Indonesian FPS has the best portals I've seen since Portal
entries.description: Mala Petaka is a striking Doom total conversion with some great level design hooks.

entries.title: The next Dota 2 hero is a ghostly gunslinger named Muerta
entries.description: Plus, Portal 2's Cave Johnson as an announcer pack.

entries.title: Build big, stupid custom spaceships with friends in Cosmoteer
entries.description: Or make functional ones, whatever, I'm not your dad.

entries.title: Today's Wordle answer and hint for Sunday, October 30
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #498 puzzle.
